articles.description: While being treated for a brain tumour, Susie Steiner has read memoirs and medical histories - but it was a novel that best captured the gruelling reality of illness
articles.content: I wrote my latest novel, Remain Silent, with a 9cm tumour pushing my brain over its midline. But I didnt know about it. I was deep into researching Operation Pheasant, a team tackling modern day slav… [+8991 chars]
